title: Liberia's 'Flags Of Convenience' Help It Stay Afloat
teaser: The weak Liberian economy has been hit by the Ebola crisis. One thing Liberia does have going for it is an unusual export â€” its flag. The Liberian flag is the second most popular flag flown by international cargo ships and is a huge source of revenue.
